snippet: Net income at the giant media company was up 47 percent despite the ongoing hacking scandal in Britain. The company’s strong cable television division helped drive the profits.
abstract: Net income at the giant media company was up 47 percent despite the ongoing hacking scandal in Britain. The company’s strong cable television division helped drive the profits.

headline.main: News Corp. Profits Increase Despite Scandal
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Reports 47% Profit Gain and a Larger Stock Buyback
